timeline.message:
Map SDL schema to introspection

As codegen works with introspection schema only, provide API to map SDL schema to introspection.

Fix some missed issues with SDL parsing.

Part of https://github.com/apollographql/apollo-android/issues/2261

timeline.bodyText: Could we rename Schema to IntropspectionSchema instead to avoid the aliased import?
timeline.author: martinbonnin
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,6 +1,12 @@
 package com.apollographql.apollo.compiler.parser.sdl
 
-data class GraphSdlSchema(
+import com.apollographql.apollo.compiler.ir.SourceLocation
+import com.apollographql.apollo.compiler.parser.sdl.GraphSDLSchemaParser.parse
+import java.io.File
+import java.util.Locale
+import com.apollographql.apollo.compiler.parser.Schema as IntrospectionSchema

replies.bodyText: For sure, it's in my list for the next PR
replies.author: sav007
